meanings.definition: A type of solitaire card game.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy playing canfield on my computer during my free time.
meanings.sent2: Canfield is a popular card game that many people play to pass the time.
meanings.sent3: When I couldn't find anyone to play cards with, I challenged myself to a game of canfield.
meanings.sent4: Her skills in canfield were like a well-shuffled deck, always coming out on top.
meanings.sent5: The sound of cards shuffling and the thrill of winning make canfield a fun game to play.
